import { useState } from 'react'; import { Routes, Route, NavLink, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Home from './components/Home' import Address from './components/Address' import Contactus from './components/Contactus' import Technologies from './components/Technologies' import Javascript from './components/Javascript' import Html from './components/Html' import Footer from './components/Footer' import Signup from './components/Signup' import Cart from './components/Cart' import Explore from './components/Explore' import More from './components/More' import {FcLinux} from 'react-icons/fc' import { Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {BsFillCartFill} from 'react-icons/Bs' import { IconContext } from "react-icons"; function App() { return (
{/* links to routes */}
  • Shop Easy
    • Address
    • Contactus
    • Sign up
    • Cart
    {/* define routes for its children */} {/* route for Home component */} } /> {/* route for formAddressForm component */} } /> {/* route for Contactus component */} } /> {/* route for Signup component */} } /> {/* route for Cartcomponent */} } /> } /> } /> {/* route for Technologies component */} } > {/* defines routes for nested components */} } /> {/* redirect to HTML by default */} } /> } />
    ); } export default App;
